scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && go mod tidy && go run ./cmd/server
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.migrate: cd backend && go mod tidy && go run ./cmd/migrate
scripts.migrate:up: cd backend && go mod tidy && go run ./cmd/migrate
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
